system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provide point of sale retail software to small business. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Reports page fails to load for some users.

conversation_history.message: The reports page is not loading for some of my team members. It just shows a spinning loader indefinitely.
Thanks for reaching out, Emily. Can you confirm if this is happening for all users or only specific ones? Also, can you provide the approximate time this issue started?
It seems to be affecting only a few users. The issue started about an hour ago.
Understood. I’ll check the logs for those users. Can you share the usernames or email addresses of the affected users to narrow it down?
Sure, here are the affected users: john.doe@example.com and lisa.smith@example.com.

Thanks! After checking the logs, it looks like there was a temporary issue with a caching mechanism for user-specific data. I’ve cleared the cache for those users, and the issue should now be resolved. Can you confirm if they can access the reports page now?
Yes, both users confirmed that the reports page is now loading properly. Thanks for the quick fix!
You’re welcome, Emily! Let us know if you face any further issues. Have a great day!

resolution: Cleared the cache for the affected users, resolving the issue.
root_cause: A caching mechanism failed to refresh user-specific data, causing the reports page to hang for certain users.
